snippet: Chelsea manager Jose Mourinho believes Liverpool have an advantage in the Premier League title race because they will not be distracted by the Champions League....

headline.print_headline: Liverpool Have an Advantage in Title Race, Says Mourinho
headline.main: Liverpool Have an Advantage in Title Race, Says Mourinho

lead_paragraph: Chelsea manager Jose Mourinho believes Liverpool have an advantage in the Premier League title race because they will not be distracted by the Champions League.
